title: Bug 49443RemoteIpValve : remoteIpHeader vs remoteIPHeader
OB: In the doc for the RemoteIpValve (http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat6.0doc/config/valve.html), the remoteIPHeader attribute is mentionned, but actually it should be remoteIpHeader (notice the lowercase "p") since the setter method is setRemoteIpHeader(..).
EB: In the doc for the RemoteIpValve (http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat6.0doc/config/valve.html), the remoteIPHeader attribute is mentionned, but actually it should be remoteIpHeader (notice the lowercase "p") since the setter method is setRemoteIpHeader(..).
